welcome_message_body: Welcome to Handa, Japan! Known for its picturesque streets lined with traditional buildings and its delicious local sake, we invite you to explore and enjoy the charm of our beautiful city.

restaurants.name: Hamazushi (はま寿司 高浜稗田店)
restaurants.description: Hamazushi (はま寿司 高浜稗田店) is a sushi restaurant located in 高浜市.

restaurants.name: かっぱ寿司 高浜店
restaurants.description: かっぱ寿司 高浜店 is a sushi restaurant located in 高浜市.

restaurants.name: Gyoza Ohsho (餃子の王将 三河高浜店)
restaurants.description: Gyoza Ohsho (餃子の王将 三河高浜店) is a chinese restaurant located in 高浜市.

restaurants.name: Gusto (ガスト 高浜店)
restaurants.description: Gusto (ガスト 高浜店) is a japanese family restaurant located in 高浜市.

restaurants.name: Rairaitei (来来亭 高浜店)
restaurants.description: Rairaitei (来来亭 高浜店) is a ramen restaurant located in 高浜市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Chu-Bu Centrair International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal for domestic flights, located on the opposite side of the airport from Terminal 1.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a limited connection time of 2 hours per session.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Komaki AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
